title: General Translation Configuration
description: Configuration schema for gt.config.json files used by General Translation CLI

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for this configuration file

_versionId.description: Internal version identifier for the configuration

runtimeUrl.description: Runtime URL for the General Translation service

projectId.description: The project ID for your General Translation project

defaultLocale.description: The default locale for your project. This is the locale that your source content is written in and serves as the fallback locale.

locales.description: An array of locales for your project. These are the locales that you want to translate your project into.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the General Translation API

dashboardUrl.description: URL for the General Translation dashboard

stageTranslations.description: Optional boolean flag that indicates whether your project is configured to use human review

src.description: Optional array of relative directory paths that contain translatable content

dictionary.description: Optional string that specifies the relative path to the dictionary file

framework.description: The framework being used in the project

version.description: Custom version ID to use for translations. Should be unique

description.description: Description of the project or configuration

files.description: Configuration for different file types that you want to translate

output.description: Output path pattern with [locale] placeholder for saving translations locally

include.description: Array of glob patterns that match the JSON files you want to translate

exclude.description: Array of glob patterns that match the JSON files you want to exclude from translation

transform.description: String defining a remapping of the file name. Should contain a wildcard * and [locale] placeholder

include.description: Array of glob patterns that match the MDX files you want to translate

exclude.description: Array of glob patterns that match the MDX files you want to exclude from translation

transform.description: String defining a remapping of the file name. Should contain a wildcard * and [locale] placeholder

include.description: Array of glob patterns that match the Markdown files you want to translate

exclude.description: Array of glob patterns that match the Markdown files you want to exclude from translation

transform.description: String defining a remapping of the file name. Should contain a wildcard * and [locale] placeholder

include.description: Array of glob patterns that match the JavaScript files you want to translate

exclude.description: Array of glob patterns that match the JavaScript files you want to exclude from translation

transform.description: String defining a remapping of the file name. Should contain a wildcard * and [locale] placeholder

include.description: Array of glob patterns that match the TypeScript files you want to translate

exclude.description: Array of glob patterns that match the TypeScript files you want to exclude from translation

transform.description: String defining a remapping of the file name. Should contain a wildcard * and [locale] placeholder
